retries.description: Number of retries for API calls, in case of e.g. transient network failures.

token.description: Customer/user-specific authorization token for the Shoreline API server. May be provided via `SHORELINE_TOKEN` env variable.

url.description: Customer-specific URL for the Shoreline API server. It should be of the form ```https://<customer>.<region>.api.shoreline-<cluster>.io``` .

complete_long_template.description: The long description of the Action's completion.

complete_short_template.description: The short description of the Action's completion.

complete_title_template.description: UI title of the Action's completion.

description.description: A user-friendly explanation of an object.

enabled.description: If the object is currently enabled or disabled. Defaults to `false`.

error_long_template.description: The long description of the Action's error condition.

error_short_template.description: The short description of the Action's error condition.

error_title_template.description: UI title of the Action's error condition.

name.description: The name of the object (must be unique).

params.description: Named variables to pass to an object (e.g. an Action).

res_env_var.description: Result environment variable ... an environment variable used to output values through.

resource_query.description: A set of Resources (e.g. host, pod, container), optionally filtered on tags or dynamic conditions.

start_long_template.description: The long description when starting the Action.

start_short_template.description: The short description when starting the Action.

start_title_template.description: UI title of the start of the Action.

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait, in milliseconds. Defaults to `60000`.

type.description: The type of object (i.e., Alarm, Action, Bot, Metric, Resource, or File).

block.description:
Shoreline action. A command that can be run.

See the Shoreline [Actions Documentation](https://docs.shoreline.io/actions) for more info.

compile_eligible.description: If the Alarm can be effectively optimized. Defaults to `true`.

condition_type.description: Kind of check in an Alarm (e.g. above or below) vs a threshold for a Metric.

condition_value.description: Switching value (threshold) for a Metric in an Alarm.

description.description: A user-friendly explanation of an object.

enabled.description: If the object is currently enabled or disabled. Defaults to `false`.

family.description: General class for an Action or Bot (e.g., custom, standard, metric, or system check). Defaults to `custom`.

fire_long_template.description: The long description of the Alarm's triggering condition.

fire_short_template.description: The short description of the Alarm's triggering condition.

fire_title_template.description: UI title of the Alarm's triggering condition.

name.description: The name of the object (must be unique).

raise_for.description: Where an Alarm is raised (e.g., local to a resource, or global to the system). Defaults to `local`.

resolve_long_template.description: The long description of the Alarm's resolution.

resolve_short_template.description: The short description of the Alarm's resolution.

resolve_title_template.description: UI title of the Alarm's' resolution.

resource_query.description: A set of Resources (e.g. host, pod, container), optionally filtered on tags or dynamic conditions.

type.description: The type of object (i.e., Alarm, Action, Bot, Metric, Resource, or File).

block.description:
Shoreline alarm. A condition that triggers Alerts or Actions.

See the Shoreline [Alarms Documentation](https://docs.shoreline.io/alarms) for more info.

description.description: A user-friendly explanation of an object.

enabled.description: If the object is currently enabled or disabled. Defaults to `false`.

family.description: General class for an Action or Bot (e.g., custom, standard, metric, or system check). Defaults to `custom`.

name.description: The name of the object (must be unique).

type.description: The type of object (i.e., Alarm, Action, Bot, Metric, Resource, or File).

block.description:
Shoreline bot. An automation that ties an Action to an Alert.

See the Shoreline [Bots Documentation](https://docs.shoreline.io/bots) for more info.

checksum.description: Cryptographic hash (e.g. md5) of a File Resource.

description.description: A user-friendly explanation of an object.

destination_path.description: Target location for a copied distributed File object.  See [Op: cp](https://docs.shoreline.io/op/commands/cp).

enabled.description: If the object is currently enabled or disabled. Defaults to `false`.

file_data.description: Internal representation of a distributed File object's data (computed).

file_length.description: Length, in bytes, of a distributed File object (computed)

input_file.description: The local source of a distributed File object.

name.description: The name of the object (must be unique).

resource_query.description: A set of Resources (e.g. host, pod, container), optionally filtered on tags or dynamic conditions.

type.description: The type of object (i.e., Alarm, Action, Bot, Metric, Resource, or File).

block.description:
Shoreline file. A datafile that is automatically copied/distributed to defined Resources.

See the Shoreline [OpCp Documentation](https://docs.shoreline.io/op/commands/cp) for more info.

description.description: A user-friendly explanation of an object.

name.description: The name of the object (must be unique).

params.description: Named variables to pass to an object (e.g. an Action).

res_env_var.description: Result environment variable ... an environment variable used to output values through.

type.description: The type of object (i.e., Alarm, Action, Bot, Metric, Resource, or File).

units.description: Units of a Metric (e.g., bytes, blocks, packets, percent).

value.description: The Op statement that defines a Metric or Resource.

block.description:
Shoreline metric. A periodic measurement of a system property.

See the Shoreline [Metrics Documentation](https://docs.shoreline.io/metrics) for more info.

description.description: A user-friendly explanation of an object.

name.description: The name of the object (must be unique).

params.description: Named variables to pass to an object (e.g. an Action).

res_env_var.description: Result environment variable ... an environment variable used to output values through.

type.description: The type of object (i.e., Alarm, Action, Bot, Metric, Resource, or File).

value.description: The Op statement that defines a Metric or Resource.

block.description:
Shoreline resource. A server or compute resource in the system (e.g. host, pod, container).

See the Shoreline [Resources Documentation](https://docs.shoreline.io/platform/resources) for more info.
